text: @NYGovCuomo What are you talking about? You locked us down to “flatten the curve.” We did it. Some increase in COVID-19 is expected upon resuming life. NOW you move the goalpost again to “no increase?” WE ARE NOT STOPPING OUR LIVES TO LIVE IN FEAR.
